name: Oh Boy! It's summer (Phase II)
description:
This the second level of my first person farming game which i posted a few days ago. ( https://aks97.itch.io/oh-boy-its-summer ). I don't want to say much about how this level is going to be integrated with the first part but I have it all planed out. 

My ultimatum of the project is to convert it in VR if it gets enough support till then i will be making tweaks here and there. Since, my current pc can barely build my project and closes after every command is given the development will be slow. I hope till then you like this project. :)

You can contact me at aayushksingh97@gmail.com if you want. Thanks for viewing this, have a nice day.
